name: The Minimart
description:
We’re a proudly independent integrated advertising agency based in Soho, London. 
We believe great work comes from fierce thinking. Fierce leaves no stone unturned. Fierce does not shrink from the challenge and risk missing something brilliant. Fierce thinking is about challenging every assumption, simplifying every thought and relentlessly crafting every idea.
Fierce thinking becomes work that engages our hearts as well as our heads.
